lit. family shames must not be spread abroad (idiom); fig. don't wash your dirty linen in public
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 chuan2

definition: Don't spread abroad the shame of the family, don't believe rumors lightly. (idiom)/Don't wash your dirty linen in public, don't listen to others' gossip.
pinyin: jia1 chou3 bu4 ke3 wai4 chuan2 , liu2 yan2 qie4 mo4 qing1 xin4
containing_words.word: 家丑不可外传，流言切莫轻信

definition: Apocrypha/biography external to the classics

sentences.english: The news of her divorce gradually rippled outwards.
sentences.chinese: 她离婚的消息渐渐向外传开。

sentences.english: He is a greto football player, from all accounts.
sentences.chinese: 外传他是个很不了起的足球运带动。

sentences.english: Can you promise not to tell this secret?
sentences.chinese: 你能保证不把这个阴私外传吗？

sentences.english: A modern english version of the bible and apocrypha.
sentences.chinese: 一个圣经的现代英语版本，新约外传。

sentences.english: Against the wine division has its own formula, never exported.
sentences.chinese: 兑酒师都有自己的配方，绝不外传。

sentences.english: Select your NG2 display picture under "Frequently used display pictures" .
sentences.chinese: 选择你喜欢的《忍者外传2》显示图片即可。

sentences.english: Xuanyuanjian 3 points to start the game after the rumored Tianzhi Hen pop-up?
sentences.chinese: 轩辕剑3外传天之痕点开始游戏后弹出？

sentences.english: Please click HERE to browse all "Ninja Gaiden 2" personal expression pack items.
sentences.chinese: 想浏览所有《忍者外传2》个人表情主题，请按此。

sentences.english: It's said that he had shair conditionerked up with several girls recently getting married.
sentences.chinese: 外传在结婚之前他和几个女孩子过过夜。

sentences.english: Accordingly, song Ci is right of sword-leaved cymbidium outside pass made graven history contribute.
sentences.chinese: 因此，宋慈对建兰的外传做出了不可磨灭的历史贡献。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the introduction of Chinese cultural treasures to the world, without doubts, relies on translation.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国要向外传介文化精髓，靠的也是翻译。

sentences.english: Between you and me , I think he's rather disloyal .
sentences.chinese: 这话只跟你说，不要外传，我看他很不忠诚。
